name: Keep On Your Path
description:
Keep On Your Path is very challenge arcade game, drag your finger to move the ball, keep it on your path.

How To Play:

1. Touch the "Touch & drag to move" box to start.
2. Drag your finger to move the ball left or right.
3. Keep the ball on your path, stay in the line, or you lose.
4. Try tap mode, it's more challenge.
5. Challenge the record with friends and all the world!

Free download and have fun!
